constantValues: An Indicator Value is a quantitative or qualitative value of measurement of an Indicator. Indicator Values may be but are not limited to baseline, target or actual values of measurement.

definitions.description: An Indicator Value is a quantitative or qualitative value of measurement of an Indicator. Indicator Values may be but are not limited to baseline, target or actual values of measurement.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: amount

constantValues: Indicates the actual value reported, expressed as a currency.

members.description: Indicates the actual value reported, expressed as a currency.

members.name: amount_Base

constantValues: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.name: baselineValue

constantValues: An IATI string definining the Baseline value for the value being reported.

members.description: An IATI string definining the Baseline value for the value being reported.

members.name: endDate

constantValues: End date of the Indicator Value.

members.description: End date of the Indicator Value.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: number

constantValues: Indicates the actual value reported, expressed as a whole number.

members.description: Indicates the actual value reported, expressed as a whole number.

members.name: percentage

constantValues: Indicates the actual value reported, expressed as a decimal.

members.description: Indicates the actual value reported, expressed as a decimal.

members.name: startDate

constantValues: Start date of the Indicator Value.

members.description: Start date of the Indicator Value.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: valueType

constantValues: Defines the Value Type of the Indicator Value

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'valueType_display' is added to the 'IndicatorValue' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'valueType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: valueType_display

members.description: Defines the Value Type of the Indicator Value

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'IndicatorValue' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Indicator Value

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'IndicatorValue' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Reason for the status of the Indicator Value

foreignKeyAttribute.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.
